name: custap-berry
effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item.  On the following turn, the holder will act first among moves with the same priority, regardless of Speed.
short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP when using a move to go first.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A Poffin ingredient. If held by a
Pokémon, it gets to move first just
once in a pinch.

once in a pinch.
